laboratory_examinations.findings: Extensive fat stranding, multiple locules of free air in the mesentery in the right iliac fossa, loculated fluid collection measuring 3.5 x 2.8 cm. Wall thickening of lower ascending colon, cecum, and terminal ileum.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Inflammatory process and fluid collection have considerably decreased since the earlier study where the collection measured 5.3 x 4.5 cm.
